TestDescription.name: Trojan shell script

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: A trojan shell script has been found. This is a tool used by attackers to execute arbitrary shell commands or browse the filesystem on a remote webserver. Usually, this is an indication that your website has been defaced and some attacker has installed this shell script to manage the webserver from remote.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can execute arbitrary shell commands in the context of the webserver process.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Delete the trojan shell script. You need to investigate the security of your website to determine the source of the security breach.
